alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Humboldt; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 02 at 8:31PM PST until January 05 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph. Gusts to 60 mph along the coastal plain. Gusts in excess of 70 mph on mountain ridgetops. * WHERE...Humboldt and Mendocino counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. If possible, adjust your travel plans and don`t travel during this time.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
